name: OSX Manage Webcam
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>
description:
This module will allow the user to detect installed webcams (with
          the LIST action), take a snapshot (with the SNAPSHOT action), or
          record a webcam and mic (with the RECORD action)

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: CAMERA_INDEX
options.description: The index of the webcam to use. `set ACTION LIST` to get a list.

options.name: MIC_INDEX
options.description: The index of the mic to use. `set ACTION LIST` to get a list.

options.name: JPG_QUALITY
options.description: The compression factor for snapshotting a jpg (from 0 to 1)

options.name: TMP_FILE
options.description: The tmp file to use on the remote machine

options.name: AUDIO_COMPRESSION
options.description: Compression type to use for audio

options.name: VIDEO_COMPRESSION
options.description: Compression type to use for video

options.name: SNAP_FILETYPE
options.description: File format to use when saving a snapshot (Accepted: jpg, png, gif, tiff, bmp)

options.name: SYNC_WAIT
options.description: Wait between syncing chunks of output
